title: English Hindi Dictionary - SHABDKOSH
description:
Hindi English Dictionary offline and free by SHABDKOSH.COM.
Features:
• Hindi To English
• English To Hindi
• Online and Offline
• Search from web or other apps
• Auto Suggestion
• Pronounce & Voice Search
• Instant search from copied text
• Antonyms - Opposite words
• Synonyms - Similar words
• Word Games - Learn English
• Share Words and Quotes
Fast, free and offline English to Hindi Dictionary and Translation app
!
The SHABDKOSH English Hindi Learning Dictionary app brings our trusted content and service to our mobile users. This English Hindi Translator and Learning Dictionary has the most comprehensive Hindi and English vocabulary you will find in any English to Hindi Dictionary App. This app has a user-friendly English Hindi Dictionary along with English definitions, word quiz, spell-the-word game, spoken audio pronunciations, synonyms and antonyms.
You can download Shabdkosh Offline Dictionary in Settings screen and use this app without mobile data also.
HINDI ENGLISH DICTIONARY AND TRANSLATOR
Start typing Hindi words using Hindi keyboard, or type Hindi words in English and have the SHABDKOSH English Hindi Dictionary app suggest you words even when not typing in Hindi! Tap any suggestion to get the English translation, meanings and spoken audio pronunciations. Tap the star icon to save the word for future so that you can learn the difficult word later. Words are provided with grammar usage like Noun, Verb, Adjectives, Pronouns etc. Also, Hindi words have the gender info shown.
ENGLISH HINDI DICTIONARY AND TRANSLATION
Type the English word and see suggestions from the huge collection of words and get to the meaning quickly by tapping any suggested word in the list. The app shows exact meanings, definitions  and short examples along with translations, synonym, antonym and right grammar attributes. You can also listen to the spoken audio pronunciation or see the pronunciation in Hindi. Through this dictionary children and students can learn names of body parts, vegetables , fruits , flowers, name of different animals. It helps in reading daily newspaper in english and helps prepare for exams -
CAT, IELTS, TOEFL, GRE, GMAT, MAT, XAT, NMAT, SNAP, SAT, SSC, CGL, Bank PO, CET, GATE, IAS, IBPS, IES, UPSC, JKSSB, PTE, DU JAT, TOEIC, NIFT, JBPS, CFE
.
HYPERLINKED ENGLISH HINDI LEARNING DICTIONARY FOR REVERSE LOOKUP
Tap on the meanings will take you to the reverse lookup any of the meanings and help you in understanding more of each word shown by presenting this unique cross-search feature.
SPOKEN AUDIO PRONUNCIATIONS IN ENGLISH AND HINDI
The Shabdkosh Offline Dictionary app has the best spoken audio pronunciations in  pleasant voices for both, English and Hindi. You can also hear American and British accents in this app. Just tap the speaker icon to hear the spoken audio pronunciation.
LEARN SOMETHING NEW EVERY DAY
We have very high quality Word of the Day and Quote of the Day features to help learn something new everyday. You can also directly lookup word while reading newspaper, books or other website. Just select, copy and tap on the SHABDKOSH app icon.
WORD GAMES
The nifty Word Quiz Game Quiz in English and Hindi helps you pass time while learning something new! The users of Shabdkosh English Hindi Offline Dictionary App are very fond of this simple and quick games - which also works without using your data in offline mode.
CONTACT & FEEDBACK
For any help and support on the Shabdkosh English Hindi offline dictionary, please use the feedback option in the app. For more info and to try Hindi to English dictionary on web, please visit https://www.shabdkosh.com
We hope you will like it and review it in the Google Play Store!
SHABDKOSH English Hindi Offline Learning Dictionary and Translation App by SHABDKOSH.COM
सबसे अच्छा और बेहतरीन हिन्दी अंग्रेजी शब्दकोश / हिन्दी अंग्रेजी डिक्शनरी -  शब्दकोश.कॉम की प्रस्तुति
